title: After a recent update, the email Search is now almost useless.
content: Thunderbird's search used to be great. It is now useless. It searches very few folders. How do I get it to search all folders?
creator: tmpc

title: Email database seems partially corrupted
content:
Today, my inbox has gotten partially corrupted. After updating to version 128, my Thunderbird has been very sluggish. While trying to troubleshoot that, I used Properties->Repair Folder on the inbox, which is when the current problem started.

In the main inbox window, everything looks fine. All emails are there, with correct subject names and correspondents, etc. Everything received before April 8 this year looks to be unaffected, but if I try to open up anything later than that, it displays a chunk of a completely different email from like 2007, with the From: and Subject: fields blank.

Additionally, doing the repair marked all emails from April 21, 2008 and earlier as unread.

I use POP3 to download all emails to my computer, two addresses going to the inbox.

I tried using Properties->Repair Folder again, but it still leaves the same result.

If I open the gigantic "Inbox" file in my Thunderbird profile folder in notepad++, scrolling down to the bottom I see the emails are still there, so they're not completely missing. In between the last good email and the first bad one, there is a huge section that starts with:

--=-SgCIEz327q/2h3s2MXJ25A== Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8 Content-Id: <92b40d02-593e-4a4a-8768-a31f564d0d90> Content-Transfer-Encoding: base64

and then hundreds of lines of gibberish, followed by "--=-SgCIEz327q/2h3s2MXJ25A==--" and then it goes to the next email.
creator: peter850

title: Microsoft want me to update my sign in technology
content:
Hi recieved this email from Microsoft and wondering what to do....


How can you set up your Gmail, Apple Mail, or other third-party mail application?

Various non-Microsoft applications will have their own steps for connecting to your Outlook.com email account using modern authentication methods. See our help article - Modern Authentication Methods now needed to continue syncing Outlook Email in non-Microsoft email apps. However, you may need to contact the creators of those applications to provide you with instructions. In many cases, simply removing and re-adding your account with the latest version of that application will configure it to use modern authentication methods. '
creator: irenee555

title: Help Needed: SMTP Error 550 - Account Locked
content:
Hello,

I'm encountering a problem with sending emails through Thunderbird. I'm receiving the following error message when trying to send emails to certain recipients: A message that you sent could not be delivered to one or more of its recipients. This is a permanent error. The following address(es) failed: 

 amandasrwt09@gmail.com    host smtp.antispamcloud.com [38.89.254.227]    SMTP error from remote mail server after end of data:    550 Your account has been locked. Please contact your administrator.  larradh6600@gmail.com    host smtp.antispamcloud.com [38.89.254.227]    SMTP error from remote mail server after end of data:    550 Your account has been locked. Please contact your administrator.

Reporting-MTA: dns; s1088.usc1.mysecurecloudhost.com

Action: failed Final-Recipient: rfc822;larradh6600@gmail.com Status: 5.0.0 Remote-MTA: dns; smtp.antispamcloud.com Diagnostic-Code: smtp; 550 Your account has been locked. Please contact your administrator.

Action: failed Final-Recipient: rfc822;amandasrwt09@gmail.com Status: 5.0.0 Remote-MTA: dns; smtp.antispamcloud.com Diagnostic-Code: smtp; 550 Your account has been locked. Please contact your administrator.

Could someone please help me understand why this is happening and how I can resolve it? It seems like the issue is related to the SMTP server or account settings, but I am unsure how to proceed.

Any assistance or guidance would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you!
creator: 2h2o1.23v

title: Continua richiesta psw mail
content: Buongiorno, possiedo un pc con windows 7. Da alcuni mesi, ogni volta che entro nel programma per scaricare la posta, mi richiede insistentemente la psw delle mail e nonostante io la inserisca continua a richiedermela, senza permettermi di scaricare la posta. Premetto che ho diversi account anche di posta certificata e di ognuna mi fa costantemente la stessa richiesta. Leggendo su alcuni forum ho visto che consigliavano di mettere una psw principale. Ho provato ma il problema persiste. Come posso risolverlo?. Grazie Piergiuseppe Bertola

title: Thunderbird has deleted emails after compacting and made others unreadable
content:
Have used Thunderbird for many years without problem but today: 1. Thunderbird asked to compact Inbox folder said OK 2. After Compacting appear to have lost all emails back to 24th Jan 2023 emails prior to that date are OK) 3. Emails which had arrived today are shown with subject and time but on opening they are blank except for message ----=_NextPart_000_00BC_01D6069F.D8AB25B0- 4. Messages which came in after compacting were OK and readable. 5. Following comments previously made tried inbox/properties/repair folder. 6. Following attempted repair messages that were readable at 4. above were now blank except for the message "Next part...." as in 3 above.

A. Can I recover my lost emails? B How do I prevent Thunderbird from corrupting new emails when it compacts folder?

Cheers

Keith keith@castlemurray.com.au

title: Forwarding emails
content: Before the latest update to TBird, I was able to forward emails by simply using "drag and drop" to put the addressee in the "To" box and click send. Now I have to click on the "To" box to highlight it, then start typing the recipients name or email address, then select the address from a drop down list, then click send. Why in the world did you change something that was so simple and easy into something that is more complicated and wastes time? Change is not always good. Is there any way I can change it back? Is there a settings button I can select to make it go back to the way it was?

creator: imtrobin

title: Thunderbird removes extra spaces between words in the subject line
content:
Hello! TB does this when composing new messages. And it doesn't matter, let him clean up my mistakes, ha ha =)

But this TB "feature" becomes a real headache when replying to incoming messages in a subject line that ALREADY have extra spaces between words.

Example Subject line incoming message: "Please check and send to us..." Thread-Topic from Source Headers: "Please check and send to us..."

Subject line in TB reply message: "Re: Please check and send to us..."

You see? TB cleared the subject of the response message from extra spaces between words. And for the sender of the first mail (which had spaces between words in the subject) - my response message got into the inbox in another thread.

And this causes us a lot of problems.

My correspondents use the MS Outlook email client. Instead of Thunderbird, I used Outlook to test and replied to the same first incoming email - and miracles! - mail was sent without changing the subject and source headers. And the sender's Outlook received a response to his email in the same thread and with the same subject, which still had extra spaces!

Can I turn off removing extra spaces from a topic in Thunderbird? Prevent them from changing the subject of their incoming or reply emails?
creator: jago3a

title: Problém s vyhledáváním e-mailových zpráv
content:
Dobrý den,

vždy zhruba po čtvrt roce se mně vyčerpá kapacita schránky. Proto si starší zprávy ukládám na disk do Místní složky, kde si vytvářím archiv podsložek, například Doručená-01-03-23. Problém mám s vyhledáváním zpráv v těchto podsložkách. Napíšu-li do kolonky na hlavní straně nahoře Hledat kontakt, objeví se mně historický seznam všech zpráv, které se mně po rozkliknutí již nezobrazí, resp. se nezobrazí ty, které jsou umístěné v podsložkách. Pokud hledám v nich podle data, je to poměrně pracné a k tomu se mně tady zprávy nezobrazují podle času přijetí nebo odeslání, ale dost na přeskáčku. Můžete mně, prosím, poradit, jak tento problém odstranit? Děkuji a jsem s pozdravem

Jan Kroupa
creator: jan.kroupa
